sourcesContent:
// src/components/InvoiceComponent.js import React from 'react'; import { Table, Row, Col, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; const InvoiceComponent = React.forwardRef(({ order }, ref) => { if (!order) { return null; } const subtotal = order.items.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.quantity * item.unit_price, 0); const taxRate = 0.08; // Example 8% tax rate const tax = subtotal * taxRate; const total = subtotal + tax; return (

INVOICE

Your Company Name

Order #: SO-{order.id}

Date: {new Date(order.order_date).toLocaleDateString()}
Bill To:

{order.customer_name || 'Valued Customer'}

 {order.items.map((item) => ( ))}
Product SKU Quantity Unit Price Total
{item.product.name} {item.product.sku} {item.quantity} ${item.unit_price} ${(item.quantity * item.unit_price).toFixed(2)}
Subtotal: ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Tax ({(taxRate * 100).toFixed(0)}%): ${tax.toFixed(2)}
Total: ${total.toFixed(2)}
); }); export default InvoiceComponent;
